name: Master Kitchen Cooking Game
description:
Indulge in an all new kitchen story of crazy food time management and kitchen games. Welcome to the Master Kitchen cooking game it is an absolutely amazing cooking games, a place where the kitchen never closes and the waiters always have big smiles on their faces. The food making games fever is back especially for the home chefs, it’s more than fun to take orders from the happy street customers. Use your authentic secret recipes from city streets and special ingredients to prepare a delicious street fast food meal and sell it in your restaurant. Provide Speedy service and please customers with the most ever finding Delicious and Unique food items. Dispense the dishes with your best recipes. Never forget the recipes. Remembering Recipe will provide speedy serving system to your clients. Master Kitchen cooking game is a beautiful cooking simulation game that tests your time management & serving skills. Make customers happy with delicious mouth watering cuisines by revealing the culinary master chef inside you. Start your venture & become a restaurant business tycoon in town. Cook deliciously crispy burgers and make tasty bar drinks for your royal customers.

You are hired in a chain Restaurant to serve your patrons the most Delicious and Unique dishes. You can cook for multiple customers at same time to improve your cooking skills within your café or restaurant. Start with burgers and cold drinks and work your way up in becoming the world best-known restaurant in the city! Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers to pizza ovens and burger makers! Feed your delighted customers with deliciously fresh vegan burger Pattie, vegetarian fillet and non-veg steak burger meals in a certain time limit. Choose the right ingredients according to your customer’s choice otherwise you’ll have to throw it in the trash. The perfectly grilled meat prepared with basil, a topping of crispy onion rings, tomatoes, hot pepperoni and paired with fruit juices or drinks is a perfect sandwich meal to serve the crazy foodie customer. Cook and serve to make the people delighted be it a breakfast, lunch or dinner.

Master Kitchen Cooking Game features:
* Unique and challenging missions
* Time management chef cooking games
* Use your favorite recipes to prepare the orders
* Speed up to serve food to all the people in time
* Run your own Restaurant & Serve Customers
* Receive coins from satisfied diners
* Spend earned money to purchase food and appliances upgrade for your restaurant kitchen

You can now live your dream of becoming a Master Chef and building your own classy restaurant with humble beginnings. Take the crazy fate of restaurant in your hands. Keep your customers happy by cooking everything from Burgers, Fries, Pizza; Take orders, tap and slide to seat customers, serve piping hot dishes and collect tips to upgrade your Master Kitchen cooking game.
